mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Usuarios(correo, nombre, tipo, area) VALUES(#{usr.correo},#{usr.nombre}, #{usr.tipo}, #{usr.area.id});
mapper.select: SELECT usr.correo as correoUsuario, usr.nombre as nombreUsuario, usr.tipo as tipoUsuario, usr.area as areaUsuario, areas.id as idArea, areas.nombre as nombreArea, areas.descripcion as descripcionArea, ini.no_iniciativa as no_iniciativa FROM usuarios as usr, areas, iniciativas as ini WHERE usr.correo=#{correo};
mapper.update: UPDATE usuarios SET tipo=#{rol.toString()} WHERE correo=#{usr.correo};
